paper_abstract: Artificial Intelligence techniques are increasingly extending and enriching decision support through such means as coordinating data delivery, analyzing data trends, providing forecasts, developing data consistency, quantifying uncertainty, anticipating the user's data needs, providing information to the user in the most appropriate forms, and suggesting courses of action. This session of the 10th International Conference on Knowledge-Based and Intelligent Information and Engineering Systems focuses on the use of Artificial Intelligence to enhance decision making.
